amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to require GAO to carry out a study of the compliance by consumer reporting agencies that compile and maintain files on consumers and the impact such compliance has on consumers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to require GAO to carry out a study of the compliance by consumer reporting agencies that compile and maintain files on consumers and the impact such compliance has on consumers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Timmons amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Timmons.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Timmons amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
